source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>Ah, excellent timing! We've just finished our work on the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. She's so much improved, I've decided to give her a new name to suit:
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000010_CID<tab>Ah, vous arrivez au bon moment<var 1D /var>! Nous venons juste de terminer nos travaux sur l'Entreprise. Nous lui avons apporté tellement d'améliorations que j'ai décidé de lui donner un nouveau nom.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>! Or simply the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>, if pressed for time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000020_CID<tab>L'Entreprise Excelsior<var 1D /var>! Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Ou pour faire plus court<var 1D /var>: l'Excelsior. Qu'est-ce que vous en pensez, ça en jette, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>Once again, she'll carry Eorzea's protectors into battle!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000030_CID<tab>Une fois de plus, cet aéronef va conduire les protecteurs d'Éorzéa vers la bataille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>All aboard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000040_WEDGE<tab>Tout le monde à bord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>I can do no more than see you off with prayers for your safety and success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000050_EDMONT<tab>Je ne peux que vous souhaiter bonne chance et prier pour votre salut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>Yet know that wheresoever you may go, my son's spirit goes with you. May the Fury grant you strength!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000060_EDMONT<tab>Où que vous alliez, sachez que l'âme de mon fils sera toujours avec vous.
Que la Conquérante vous donne sa force<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Return to us─all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000070_AYMERIC<tab>Je compte sur vous pour tous nous revenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>...engage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_000080_CID<tab>Excelsior, en route<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>This is it! Get ready!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100010_CID<tab>Nous y sommes<var 1D /var>! Préparez-vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>Eye of mine enemy! Render unto me thy power!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100020_ESTINIEN<tab>Œil de mon ennemi<var 1D /var>! Donne-moi ton pouvoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>Ugh... No... You will not claim me! I am the master!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100030_ESTINIEN<tab>Argh... Non... Tu ne m'auras pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>Yaaaaaargh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100040_CID<tab>Ouuuaaaarrrgh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're through!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça a marché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>Chief! We've got an imperial battleship on our tail! And it's bleedin' <var 1A 02 /var>massive<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100060_BIGGS<tab>Patron<var 1D /var>! Nous avons un aéronef impérial aux fesses<var 1D /var>! Et il est... vachement gros<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>Damn it! The bastards were waiting for us to open the door for them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100070_CID<tab>Merde<var 1D /var>! Ces salauds ont sûrement guetté notre venue pour profiter du passage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>I'm going to try to shake them! Hang on to something!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100080_CID<tab>Je vais essayer de les semer<var 1D /var>! Accrochez-vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>Uwaaaaaah! We're all going to die! Tataruuu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100090_WEDGE<tab>Ouaaaah<var 1D /var>! Nous allons tous mourir<var 1D /var>! Tataruuuu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>She won't take much more of this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100100_BIGGS<tab>Nous n'allons pas pouvoir tenir longtemps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>The time is come to use Hydaelyn's gift.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100110_ICEHEART<tab>Le temps est venu d'utiliser le don d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>Much blood has been spilled in my name. And for what? For a false cause that I created for want of the warmth of companionship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100120_ICEHEART<tab>Tant de sang a été répandu en mon nom... Et pourquoi<var 1D /var>? Une cause créée de toutes pièces par moi-même afin d'assouvir mon désir de chaleur et de camaraderie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>Saint Shiva...Hraesvelgr... Pray forgive this fool.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100130_ICEHEART<tab>Sainte Shiva, Hraesvelgr... Pardonnez-moi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>But even now, I cannot let go of my dream─my dream of a tomorrow in which no child need freeze alone in the snow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100140_ICEHEART<tab>Pourtant, je ne peux abandonner mon rêve... Un jour viendra où plus aucun enfant ne tremblera de froid seul dans la neige...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>Thank you, Hraesvelgr.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100150_ICEHEART<tab>Merci, Hraesvelgr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Is that...Ysayle? What does she mean to do!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais... c'est Ysayle<var 1D /var>! Que cherche-t-elle à faire<var 1D /var>!?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>O goddess born of mine own hopes and dreams.
For the last time, I beseech you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100170_ICEHEART<tab>Ô Déesse née de mes espoirs et de mes rêves... J'en appelle à vous une dernière fois<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>Fill this vessel with your light! Still the hatred
within our hearts and bless us with eternal grace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100180_ICEHEART<tab>Baignez mon être dans votre lumière<var 1D /var>! Apaisez la haine dans nos cœurs et apportez-nous la grâce éternelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>Farewell, Warrior of Light. And thank you─for showing me the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100190_ICEHEART<tab>Adieu, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière. Je te remercie de m'avoir montré la voie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>NOOOOOO!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Non<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>This aether... It was a Crystal of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100210_YSHTOLA<tab>Cet éther... C'était un cristal de Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>She, too, was one of Hydaelyn's chosen...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100220_YSHTOLA<tab>Elle aussi était une protégée d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>Fare you well, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_100230_ESTINIEN<tab>Repose en paix, Cœur-de-glace.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>Our objective lies at the heart of the isle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200010_REGULA<tab>Notre objectif est au cœur de cette île.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>The Third will remain to guard the ship, while the Second patrols the perimeter and eliminates any threats.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200020_REGULA<tab>La Troisième compagnie va rester en arrière pour protéger l'aéronef, pendant que la Deuxième va se disperser et neutraliser les mécanismes de défense allagois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>The First will come with me to secure the research facility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200030_REGULA<tab>La Première va m'accompagner pour prendre le contrôle du Laboratoire de magismologie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>Let no man doubt the import of our mission: the Allagans found a means to capture eikons alive, and their knowledge lies hid upon this isle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200040_REGULA<tab>Notre mission est de la plus haute importance. Les Allagois avaient découvert un moyen de capturer les Primordiaux vivants, et leur savoir est caché sur cette île.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>If we can but acquire it, we would be able to prevent the beings from returning to plague us, thus ending the cycle of rebirth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200050_REGULA<tab>En l'acquérant, nous serons capables d'empêcher ces entités de revenir nous menacer et nous mettrons un terme à leur cycle de renaissance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>I need not remind you that success will raise our legion high in the Emperor's regard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200060_REGULA<tab>Je n'ai pas besoin de vous rappeler que notre réussite permettra à notre légion de se hisser haut dans l'estime de l'Empereur. Qui plus est, Sa Majesté ne tolère aucun échec.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>Yet, by the same token, His Radiance does not tolerate failure. That is all. All troops, prepare for deployment!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200070_REGULA<tab>Que toutes les compagnies se préparent à se déployer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>So that is their purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200080_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est donc ça, leur objectif...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>To think that the knowledge used to bind no less a being than Bahamut sleeps here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et dire que la technologie qui a permis de capturer Bahamut est cachée ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>Imprisoning a primal in such a manner would represent an effective means to halt the cycle of summoning─were it not for the grave and obvious risks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200100_YSHTOLA<tab>Emprisonner un Primordial de cette façon est assurément un moyen d'arrêter le cycle des invocations... À condition de ne pas se soucier des risques, bien sûr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We need but refer to past experience─that of Bahamut's calamitous return─to see why this is not the solution we seek.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200110_ALPHINAUD<tab>En effet. Il nous suffit de voir ce qui s'est déjà produit, notamment le retour destructeur de Bahamut, pour comprendre que ce n'est pas la solution que nous souhaitons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>Held in duress, a primal will continue to nurse its hatred for mankind. And when it inevitably breaks free, its rage will be beyond quelling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200120_YSHTOLA<tab>Même en captivité, ces êtres continuent de nourrir leur haine pour le genre humain. Et inévitablement, lorsqu'ils retrouvent leur liberté, leur colère devient in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>trô<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>ble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>Whatever folly the Garleans mean to commit, they can wait. We must remain focused on our task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200130_ESTINIEN<tab>Peu importe ce que les Garlemaldais mijotent, ils peuvent attendre. Nous devons rester concentrés sur notre mission.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, of course. It would not be polite to keep the archbishop waiting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_200140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Exactement. Retrouvons d'abord l'Archevêque.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>That would explain my men's silence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300010_REGULA<tab>Voilà qui explique le silence radio de l'unité... Nous nous rencontrons de nouveau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>We meet again. And this time, we will not be interrupted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300020_REGULA<tab>Rien ni personne ne viendra nous gêner, cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>Come! Show me your power, champions of Eorzea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_300030_REGULA<tab>Approche, héro<var 08 E905 ((ïne)) ((s)) /var> d'Éorzéa<var 1D /var>! Montre-moi de quoi tu es fait<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>I had heard the tales of your strength, Warrior of Light. And now that I have experienced it firsthand, van Baelsar's defeat seems less inexplicable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400010_REGULA<tab>On m'a beaucoup parlé de ta force, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière. Et maintenant que j'en ai eu une dé<var 16 /var>mon<var 16 /var>stra<var 16 /var>tion, la défaite de van Baelsar me paraît moins inexplicable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>You are a formidable foe, and I have thoroughly enjoyed our time together. Alas, all good things must come to an end. Allagan secrets await, and there is no profit to be had in remaining here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400020_REGULA<tab>Tu es un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> adversaire ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>, et j'aurais aimé pouvoir te consacrer plus de temps. Hélas, toutes les bonnes choses ont une fin. J'ai eu ce que je voulais, et par conséquent, je n'ai plus aucune raison de m'attarder ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>Keep them occupied!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400030_REGULA<tab>Vous autres, retenez-les<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>Coward...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400040_ESTINIEN<tab>Sale couard<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem we have no choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>On dirait bien que nous n'avons pas le choix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>You must continue on. We will hold them here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous devez continuer. Nous allons les retenir ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>Take the Eye. It should still hold enough energy to be of use to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400070_ESTINIEN<tab>Prends l'Œil. Il devrait contenir assez d'énergie pour te servir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>I shall join you as soon as I am able.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400080_ESTINIEN<tab>Je te rejoins dès que possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>Enough talk! Make haste and stop the archbishop!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_400090_YSHTOLA<tab>Assez discuté<var 1D /var>! Dépêche-toi et arrête l'Archevêque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>(-???-)Who cometh to this forsaken place and disturbeth my solitude?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500010_TIAMAT<tab>(-???-)Qui ose venir en ce lieu oublié et déranger ma solitude<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, my child.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tiamat, mon enfant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)...Father? Can it truly be you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500030_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)... Père<var 1D /var>? Est-ce vraiment toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>None other. My form is such that I may journey with Hydaelyn's chosen─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nul autre. Cette forme me permet d'accompagner <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> protégé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A mortal who desireth to end the war between man and dragon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500050_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var> qui désire mettre un terme à la guerre entre les hommes et les dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Millennia have passed since I was brought low by the men of Allag. To think that war rageth still between our kinds...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500060_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Des millénaires ont passé depuis que les gens d'Allag m'ont mise à bas. Et malgré tout, la guerre fait toujours rage entre nos peuples...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Hearken to my tale, child of man. I am Tiamat, of Midgardsormr's first brood.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500070_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Écoute mon histoire, humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Je suis Tiamat, l'un des premiers rejetons de Midgardsormr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)In a time before time, my father did come to this star, bearing seven eggs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500080_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Avant le commencement de toutes choses, mon père est venu sur cette planète, avec sept œufs dans son sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>From these eggs did my children hatch. And once they were full-grown, they took wing and spread across all the lands of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500090_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>De ces œufs sont nés mes enfants. Et lorsqu'ils ont grandi, ils ont pris leur envol, parcourant les terres d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Together with my brood-brother Bahamut, I journeyed south to Meracydia. And together, we brought forth innumerable children into the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500100_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)En compagnie de mon frère Bahamut, j'ai voyagé vers le sud, jusqu'à Méracydia. Ensemble, nous avons engendré un grand nombre d'enfants.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)We abided in peace, and all was well...until the men of Allag came, some five thousand years since. They slaughtered my children in droves, and took from me my beloved Bahamut.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500110_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Nous vivions en paix, et tout allait pour le mieux... jusqu'à l'apparition des hommes d'Allag, il y a cinq mille ans. Ils massacrèrent ma progéniture, et aussi mon Bahamut bien-aimé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)'Twas then, when I had fallen into the depths of despair, that black-robed men came unto me. The Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500120_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)C'est alors que j'avais sombré dans le tréfonds du désespoir, que ces hommes en robe noire apparurent. Les Asciens...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)They offered to resurrect Bahamut through their dark arts, and I, in my grief, accepted─a decision which I shall regret unto my dying breath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500130_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ils m'offrirent de ressusciter Bahamut grâce à leurs sombres artifices, et dans mon malheur, je fis l'erreur d'accepter... Une décision que je regretterai jusqu'à mon dernier souffle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)For what they brought back was a mockery of my beloved. Worse, the Ascians gifted his murderers the means to entrap him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500140_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Ce qu'ils m'apportèrent n'était qu'un simulacre de mon bien-aimé. Pire encore, les Asciens donnèrent à ses bourreaux les moyens de l'emprisonner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Know this, child of man: the beings thy kind call gods are but specters of thy mind's creation, given form at great cost to Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500150_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, tu dois savoir que ceux que les tiens appellent dieux ne sont que des spectres créés par leurs esprits, prenant forme au détriment d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Many such beings yet slumber across the land, brought to heel by the selfsame empire that bound me. They must not be released into the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500160_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Un grand nombre de ces êtres dorment dans ce monde, vaincus par l'empire qui m'a mise aux fers. Ils ne doivent en aucun cas être réveillés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)If thou wouldst end the conflict, vanquish thee the Ascians, and deliver the weak of will from the bonds of their dark influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500170_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Si tu veux mettre un terme au conflit, tu dois vaincre les Asciens et libérer de leur sombre influence ceux dont la volonté est faible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>It hath been five thousand years, my child. Wilt thou not forgive thyself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500180_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Cela fait maintenant cinq mille ans, mon enfant. Ne veux-tu pas pardonner, toi aussi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)The release of death is denied me here, yet I desire not freedom. Nay, Father. I shall live with my regret until the world itself hath ceased to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500190_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)La délivrance de la mort m'est refusée ici, et pourtant je ne désire pas la liberté. Non, Père. Je vivrai avec mon regret jusqu'à ce que le monde ne soit plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Such is my just punishment for consorting with Darkness─for calling forth a loathsome and lamentable creature which blackeneth my beloved's memory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_500200_TIAMAT<tab>(-Tiamat-)Tel est mon châtiment pour m'être associée aux Ténèbres, et pour avoir condamné mon bien-aimé à un sort pire que la mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>Warrior of Light. Beloved <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600010_HYDAELYN<tab>Porteu<var 08 E905 ((se)) ((r)) /var> du cristal, mon enfant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>The Light abideth within thy heart again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600020_HYDAELYN<tab>La Lumière resplendit de nouveau dans ton cœur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>Full valiantly didst thou overcome thy many trials.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600030_HYDAELYN<tab>Vaillamment, tu as surmonté tes nombreuses épreuves.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>But glory not in thy success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600040_HYDAELYN<tab>Mais ne relâche pas ta vigilance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>For the servants of Darkness are ever close at hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600050_HYDAELYN<tab>Car les serviteurs des Ténèbres sont toujours à proximité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>Receive of me my blessing once more,
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600060_HYDAELYN<tab>Reçois ma bénédiction.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>And go forth, to shine thy Light on all creation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_600070_HYDAELYN<tab>Va et laisse ta Lumière éclairer tous les êtres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Thou hast broken down the wall I built around thee, and partaken of thy mistress's blessing once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700010_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu t'es libéré<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de mon <var 1A 02 /var>étreinte<var 1A 01 /var> et tu as retrouvé la bénédiction d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Strong art thou, mortal─stronger than any other of thy kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700011_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tu es fort<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>. Plus fort<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> que tous ceux des tiens que j'ai connus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Having looked upon thy deeds, I am convinced. Thou art worthy to bear Her Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700020_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Ayant été témoin de tes actes, je suis désormais convaincu que tu es digne de sa Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>The covenant bound me to thee, but 'twould seem our fates were mingled from the first. Though I will not fight thy battles, I will yet lend thee my wings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700030_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Un ancien pacte m'a lié à toi, mais il semble que le destin devait nous unir depuis le début. Je ne combattrai pas à ta place, mais je te prêterai mes ailes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Come, mortal─we go to cast out the Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_700040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Viens, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var>. Ensemble, nous allons chasser les Ténèbres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>The champion of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800010_LAHABREA<tab>Te voici, protégé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Tell me: why do you despise the primals so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Dis-moi, pourquoi méprises-tu tant les Primordiaux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>They are the embodiment of mortal will─of mortal desire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Ils sont l'incarnation même de l'envie, de l'avidité des mortels.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>Plainly, you <var 1A 02 /var>desire<var 1A 01 /var> a foe to despise. And 'tis well
that you do, for it is from the vortex of ceaseless conflict
that Lord Zodiark shall be reborn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800040_IGEYOHRM<tab>Tu cherches clairement un ennemi à haïr.
Et tant mieux, car c'est du tourbillon créé par vos conflits incessants que notre maître Zordiarche renaîtra.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>Through the Joining, the world shall become whole again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800050_LAHABREA<tab>À travers la Réunion, le monde redeviendra un et entier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>Then all shall be as once it was─as it should ever have remained.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800060_LAHABREA<tab>Alors tout sera comme avant, et comme cela devrait toujours être.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>For the glory of Lord Zodiark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Gloire au grand Zordiarche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>Your meddling ends here and now, Warrior of Light!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_800080_LAHABREA<tab>C'en est fini de tes immixtions, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>Such strength! It defies all reason...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900010_LAHABREA<tab>Une telle force<var 1D /var>! Cela défie l'entendement...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>No! I will not be bested by the likes of them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900020_IGEYOHRM<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Je ne me laisserai pas surpasser par des humains<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Lahabrea! It is time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900030_IGEYOHRM<tab>Lahabrea<var 1D /var>! Le moment est venu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>Very well. Let us show these mortals the true power of the Echo...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900040_LAHABREA<tab>Très bien. Nous allons montrer à ce<var 08 E905 ((tte)) (()) /var> mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var> le véritable potentiel de l'Écho...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>The power to break down the barriers of existence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900050_LAHABREA<tab>Le pouvoir de transcender les limites mêmes de l'existence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>I am become you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900060_IGEYOHRM<tab>Ah... Nous fusionnons...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>...And we are become one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900070_LAHABREA<tab>... Et ne formons plus qu'un.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Come, mortals! Render up your souls, that Lord Zodiark might be reborn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_900080_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Viens, mortel<var 08 E905 ((le)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! Offre ton âme pour la résurrection de Zordiarche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Aaargh!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00010_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Aaaaarrrgh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>What walls are these? Arrrgh! Damn you, Hydaelyn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00020_ASCIANPRIME<tab>Des parois... autour de nos âmes<var 1D /var>! Raaah<var 1D /var>! Sois maudite, Hydaelyn<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>That <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> might regain the blessing of Light I had foreseen...<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00030_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Hmpf<var 1D /var>! Non seulement <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> a retrouvé la bénédiction de la Lumière...<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>But <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is grown so strong in it as to deny us our power.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00040_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Mais cela lui confère une telle force qu'<var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> est capable de briser notre pouvoir.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let us withdraw, Lahabrea. That power remains to us, at least.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00050_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Partons, Lahabrea. Ils ne peuvent pas nous empêcher de fuir.<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Impossible!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00060_IGEYOHRM<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>C-c'est impossible<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Aaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00070_IGEYOHRM<tab>Aaaaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>So you harnessed the Eye's power... A pity you spent it all. What will you do now, hero?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00080_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Tu as donc réussi à maîtriser le pouvoir de l'Œil. Quel dommage que tu l'aies épuisé... Que vas-tu faire maintenant<var 1D /var>?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>So, not even the vaunted Warrior of Light can unmake an Ascian without relying upon mortal contrivances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00090_THORDAN<tab>Ainsi, même l'illustre Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière ne peut détruire un Ascien sans avoir recours à de vulgaires artifices...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You!<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00100_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Thordan<var 1D /var>!<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>In the distant past, King Thordan and his knights twelve fought and defeated Nidhogg.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00110_THORDAN<tab>Il y a bien longtemps, le premier roi d'Ishgard et ses douze chevaliers ont combattu et vaincu Nidhogg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>Though the victory cost them dear, they were rewarded with a great prize: the dread wyrm's eyes, both of which have since been held in the Holy See's safekeeping.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00120_THORDAN<tab>Malgré le prix qu'ils ont dû payer pour la victoire, leur récompense était sans égale<var 1D /var>: les yeux de l'ancien dragon. Ces trésors ont été tenus en bonne garde pendant des siècles par le Saint-Siège.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>The Eye you possess was Nidhogg's left, and long has it served as the source of the Azure Dragoon's might. As for its twin...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00130_THORDAN<tab>Celui que tu possèdes est l'œil gauche de Nidhogg, et il a procuré son pouvoir au Dragon céleste, de génération en génération. Quant à l'autre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>It has lain here, joined to the person of Haldrath, the first Azure Dragoon. For though he learned to harness its power, he was ultimately consumed by it. Even in death, his body decays not─a pitiful end for a fabled hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00140_THORDAN<tab>Il est lié à la personne de Haldrath, le premier des protecteurs du peuple ishgardais. Et bien qu'il ait été capable de jouir de sa puissance, il a fini par succomber à son influence. Désormais, il gît ici sans que sa chair ne pourrisse. Une bien misérable fin pour un héros légendaire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>My Ascian friend. Long have you and your kind sown the seeds of chaos by teaching mortals the secrets of summoning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00150_THORDAN<tab>Ascien, pendant longtemps toi et tes semblables avez semé les graines du chaos en initiant les mortels aux secrets de l'invocation divine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>But if you assumed that we would meekly serve as your pawns, then you are gravely mistaken.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00160_THORDAN<tab>Mais si vous croyiez que nous allions vous laisser nous utiliser comme des pions, vous vous êtes gravement fourvoyés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You would raise a hand against us!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00170_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Oserais-tu te retourner contre nous<var 1D /var>!?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>By taking unto my flesh the soul of the legendary King Thordan, I am become a god─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00180_THORDAN<tab>En accueillant en moi l'âme du légendaire roi Thordan, je suis devenu un dieu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>A god who knows not cessation, whose being is sustained by a millennium of fervent prayer and the Eye's nigh-bottomless reservoir of aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00190_THORDAN<tab>Un dieu éternel, dont l'être même est nourri par un millier d'années de ferventes prières et les vastes ressources d'éther de l'Œil du dragon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>What!?<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00200_LAHABREA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Que dis-tu<var 1D /var>!?<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>Your contempt for man has proven your undoing, Ascian. For my first act as god-king, I do hereby sentence you to die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00210_THORDAN<tab>C'est ton mépris pour les hommes qui aura causé ta perte, Ascien. Mon premier acte en tant que dieu-roi sera de te condamner à mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>Aaaaaargggh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00220_LAHABREA<tab>Aaaaaargggh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>Gods feed upon aether. It matters not what form that aether takes. Ascian souls are no exception. With this power, I shall put an end to a thousand years of conflict.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00230_THORDAN<tab>Les dieux se nourrissent d'éther, quelle que soit sa forme. L'âme d'un Ascien n'échappe pas à cette règle. Avec ce nouveau pouvoir, je vais mettre fin à un millénaire de conflits.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>Be they sown by Ascian, dragon, or primal, wheresoever the seeds of chaos threaten to quicken, I shall excise them with my divine blade and bring order to the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00240_THORDAN<tab>Asciens, dragons ou Primordiaux... Peu importe qui apporte le chaos, il subira le châtiment de mon épée divine, et je restaurerai l'ordre dans ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>I am become that which you abhor, Warrior of Light. If you would take issue with my godhood, I shall answer you with my blade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_A00250_THORDAN<tab>Je suis devenu ce que tu abhorres le plus, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière. Si tu oses défier ma divinité, je devrai te terrasser, toi aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Brothers! The time is come to call upon the true power of the Heavens' Ward!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00010_ZEPHIRIN<tab>Frères<var 1D /var>! Le temps est venu de révéler le véritable pouvoir des chevaliers de l'Azur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>Fight me if you will, Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00020_THORDAN<tab>Viens donc m'affronter, Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>I care not. All who stand against me will be destroyed─
be they servants of the Darkness or the Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00030_THORDAN<tab>Je ne te crains point. Tous ceux qui s'opposent à moi seront détruits,
qu'ils servent les Ténèbres ou la Lumière.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>By my blessing shall all men be sanctified, and an endless era
of peace begin. Vice and conflict shall cease to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00040_THORDAN<tab>Par ma bénédiction, tous les hommes seront sanctifiés, et une ère de paix éternelle commencera.
Tous les conflits disparaîtront.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>You reject my divinity, yet what have you to offer
my people in its stead? Bitter truth? Virtuous suffering?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00050_THORDAN<tab>Tu rejettes ma divinité, mais qu'as-tu à offrir à mon peuple à la place<var 1D /var>? Une dure réalité<var 1D /var>?
Une souffrance vertueuse<var 1D /var>?

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>No matter. If you believe your cause just,
I call upon you to defend it with your life!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_B00060_THORDAN<tab>Peu importe. Si tu crois que ta cause est juste, prouve que tu es capable de la défendre avec ta vie<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>How...how can this be? A millennium of prayer
and the Eye's power combined─and still you stand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00010_THORDAN<tab>Comment... est-ce possible<var 1D /var>? Un millénaire de prières et le pouvoir de l'Œil... n'ont pas suffi à te vaincre<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>Who─<var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00020_THORDAN<tab>Mais quel genre d'humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> es-tu donc<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>...It is over, then? I had hoped that mine would be the hand to end it...but knowing you, there was little chance of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00030_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu as déjà fini<var 1D /var>? Et moi qui espérais mettre fin à tout ça de mes propres mains... Dommage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twould seem the Eye has served you well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00040_ESTINIEN<tab>Il semblerait que l'Œil t'ait bien servi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Its twin... At long last...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00050_ESTINIEN<tab>Et voici l'autre... Il est enfin entre mes mains...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>All that remains is to take them beyond the reach of man and dragon both. With this task accomplished, my toils shall finally be at an end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00060_ESTINIEN<tab>Il ne me reste plus qu'à les emporter hors d'atteinte des hommes et des dragons. Lorsque ce sera fait, j'aurai enfin accompli mon devoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>Thou hadst done well to resist mine influence, bathed in my power and blood as thou wert.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00070_NIDHOGG<tab>Tu as admirablement réussi à résister à ma voix, toi qui as été baigné par mon pouvoir et mon sang.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>Alas, in thine anticipation of comfort, thou hast lowered thy guard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00080_NIDHOGG<tab>Hélas, dans ton pathétique désir de réconfort, tu as baissé la garde de ton esprit et tu t'es ainsi exposé à mon influence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>The keening of my fallen kindred... Their smoldering desire for vengeance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00090_NIDHOGG<tab>Les lamentations de mes semblables vaincus... Leur ardent désir de revanche...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>Mine eyes have partaken of a thousand years of pain─a pain which I shall bestow upon thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00100_NIDHOGG<tab>Mes yeux ont été témoins d'un millier d'années de douleur. Une douleur que je vais désormais t'infliger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>Drink deep of my rage, mortal...AND BECOME ME!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00110_NIDHOGG<tab>Reçois mon ire, mortel, et deviens Nidhogg<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>Grrraaarrrgh!!!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00120_ESTINIEN<tab>Grrraaarrrgh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg, my child... What hath thy fury made of thee...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Nidhogg, mon enfant... La mort elle-même n'a pas pu atténuer ta colère...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Let us away, servant of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_C00140_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Partons, protégé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'Hydaelyn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>Chief! Over there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00010_WEDGE<tab>Patron<var 1D /var>! L<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>Oi!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00020_BIGGS<tab>Hééé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab>Haha! Godsdammit, do you always have to cut it so bloody close!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00030_CID<tab>Hohoho<var 1D /var>! Par les Douze, n'as-tu donc aucune pitié pour mon pauvre cœur<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has done it again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00040_YSHTOLA<tab>Une fois de plus, <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((il)) /var> a réussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was there ever any doubt?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00050_ALPHINAUD<tab>En avons-nous jamais douté<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us return to Ishgard. Our friends will be eager to learn the battle's outcome...and welcome back their champion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Retournons à Ishgard. Nos amis sont sans doute impatients d'apprendre l'issue du combat... et d'accueillir leur héro<var 08 E905 ((ïne)) ((s)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Where is Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_D00070_YSHTOLA<tab>Où est Estinien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>I daresay you are the first soul in Ishgardian history to arrive in our city upon dragonback. This scene shall be remembered for a thousand years to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00010_AYMERIC<tab>Je crois bien que vous êtes la première personne dans l'histoire d'Ishgard à entrer dans notre cité à dos de dragon. Ce moment restera dans les mémoires pour le millier d'années à venir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>As we had feared, the archbishop summoned the soul of King Thordan unto himself and thence became a primal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Comme nous le craignions, l'Archevêque avait invoqué l'âme du roi Thordan dans son propre corps et était devenu un Primordial.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab>But he and his knights are no more, thanks to the Warrior of Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00030_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais lui et ses chevaliers ont été défaits par l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> Guerri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de la Lumière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Your struggles are not yet over, mortals.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00040_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Vous n'êtes pas encore au bout de vos peines, mortels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>Whom do I have the pleasure...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00050_AYMERIC<tab>À qui ai-je l'honneur<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I am Midgardsormr. I have journeyed with Hydaelyn's champion and observed <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds in the conflict between man and dragon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00060_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Je suis Midgardsormr. J'ai voyagé avec l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> champion<var 08 E905 ((ne)) (()) /var> d'Hydaelyn et observé ses actes dans le conflit entre les hommes et les dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Tell me, children of Thordan. Do you desire peace?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00070_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Dis-moi, enfant de Thordan. Désires-tu vraiment la paix<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>My people have committed unspeakable atrocities against dragonkind─even against our own. Would that we could undo these wrongs...but we cannot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00080_AYMERIC<tab>Mon peuple a commis d'épouvantables atrocités contre les dragons... et même contre les siens. Si seulement nous pouvions réparer ces crimes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>Be that as it may, the future yet presents a chance to begin anew. Our nation has broken free of the shackles of a false faith, and Nidhogg shall lead his kindred against us no more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00090_AYMERIC<tab>Mais bien que le passé ne puisse être changé, l'avenir offre la chance de recommencer sur des bases nouvelles. Notre nation s'est libérée des chaînes d'une foi factice, et Nidhogg ne conduira plus les siens contre nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>I doubt not that it will require much effort and perseverance, but 'tis my belief that, in time, Ishgard will again become a place where man and dragon may abide together in harmony.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00100_AYMERIC<tab>Je ne doute pas que cela nécessitera beaucoup d'efforts et de persévérance, mais j'ai la conviction qu'avec le temps, Ishgard redeviendra un endroit où les hommes et les dragons pourront vivre ensemble en harmonie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>I shall remember thy words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00110_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Je n'oublierai pas tes paroles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Yet be warned: Nidhogg's soul liveth on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00120_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Sois pourtant averti<var 1D /var>: bien que Nidhogg n'ait plus d'enveloppe charnelle, son âme continue d'exister.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>His unbridled rage hath claimed for its vessel the one thou callest the Azure Dragoon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00130_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Son immense colère a désormais pour vaisseau celui que vous appelez le Dragon céleste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00140_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Doubt not but that Nidhogg will call out to his brood ere long, nor that they shall answer him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00150_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Il ne fait aucun doute que d'ici peu, Nidhogg lancera un appel à ses semblables, et ils répondront à son rugissement vindicatif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Steel yourselves, for the true test is yet to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00160_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Armez-vous bien, car votre véritable épreuve vous attend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>Come what may, we will never cease to believe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00170_AYMERIC<tab>Quoi qu'il arrive, nous continuerons d'y croire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>Upon the souls of they who have sacrificed themselves to pave the way for peace, we will never abandon our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00180_AYMERIC<tab>Au nom de tous ceux qui se sont sacrifiés pour rendre la paix possible, nous n'abandonnerons jamais notre cause.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>A thousand-year war cannot be ended in a day. It may take generations. What thou dost begin, thy children must continue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00190_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Une guerre de mille ans ne peut pas être arrêtée en une journée. Cela prendra peut-être des générations. Ce que tu as commencé, tes enfants devront le poursuivre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Entrust unto them thy hopes and dreams, that peace may reign again...and forevermore.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03007_E00200_MIDGARDSORMR<tab>Confie-leur tes espoirs et tes rêves, pour que la paix puisse régner à nouveau... et pour toujours.
